entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Orangeville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:45 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mono Centre 03:00 AM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023
Temperature: 4.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 4.3°C
Wind: SSW 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Temperature rising to 7 this evening then steady. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Periods of rain beginning before morning. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Temperature rising to 7 this evening then steady. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain. Temperature falling to plus 2 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early in the afternoon. Temperature falling to plus 2 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
